definition: spring mattress (loanword from "Simmons" bedding company name)
woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream

sentences.english: Twice after buying Simmons, THL borrowed more.
sentences.chinese: THL收购了席梦思床品公司后又借了两倍多的款。

sentences.english: Simmons is a leading manufacturer of a renowned brand of mattress, bedding, accessories and bedroom furniture sold throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 席梦思是全球床垫及卧室家具行业的领导企业。

sentences.english: Grandmother feels sleeping on plank bed is more comfortable than on the spring mattress.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶觉得板床比“席梦思”睡着舒服。

sentences.english: The Simmons bedding company was born.
sentences.chinese: 席梦思床品公司就这样诞生了。

sentences.english: This matrix is no good for the bed.
sentences.chinese: 这个席梦思对床不好的。

sentences.english: Simmons is now groaning under a huge amount of debt at a time when its sales are slowing.
sentences.chinese: 席梦思公司现在承受着巨大的债务，业务也运营缓慢。

definition: summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]
